mapper.insert: insert into Entity (pmid, sentence_id, name, type, taggedby) values (#{pmid},#{sentenceId},#{name},#{type},#{taggedby})
mapper.select: select id, pmid, sentence_id as sentenceId, name, type, taggedby from Entity where sentence_id = #{sentenceId}
